# id: RestGetSourceAction -> RestGetSourceResponseListener -> private void checkResource(final GetResponse response)
commentText: Checks if the requested document or source is missing.__@param response a response_@throws ResourceNotFoundException if the document or source is missing
codeText: private void checkResource(final GetResponse response) {_            final String index = response.getIndex()__            final String type = response.getType()__            final String id = response.getId()___            if (response.isExists() == false) {_                throw new ResourceNotFoundException("Document not found [" + index + "]/[" + type + "]/[" + id + "]")__            } else if (response.isSourceEmpty()) {_                throw new ResourceNotFoundException("Source not found [" + index + "]/[" + type + "]/[" + id + "]")__            }_        }
